'''''Vinyar Tengwar 44''''' is the forty-fourth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|43|45}}

==Contents==
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "'Words of Joy': Five Catholic Prayers in Quenya, Part two"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, eds. Patrick H. Wynne, Arden R. Smith, and Carl F. Hostetter
** 4. ''[[Ortírielyanna]] (Sub Tuum Praesidium)''
** 5. [[The Litany of Loreto]]
* "''[[Ae Adar Nín]]'': The Lord's Prayer in Sindarin"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Bill Welden
* "''[[Alcar mi Tarmenel na Erun]]'': The ''Gloria in Exclesis Deo'' in Quenya"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Arden R. Smith

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
